text: James Edward Banks (born July 16, 1979) is an American politician who is the junior United States Senator from Indiana since 2025. He was a member of the U.S. representative for from 2017 to 2025. He is a Republican. In January 2023, Banks announced his candidacy for the U.S. Senate in the 2024 election. He won the election in November 2024. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Indiana Category:Members of the Indiana General Assembly Category:United States representatives from Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jim Banks
